articles.title: BCCI announces India men’s and women’s squads for 19th Asian Games at Hangzhou - The Indian Express
articles.description: The women’s cricket competition will take place from September 19-28 while the men's competition will start from September 28-October 8. Both the competitions will be played in T20 formats.
articles.content: The BCCI on Friday announced both the men’s and the women’s team which will take part in the upcoming Hangzhou Asian Games, scheduled to start from September 23 and end on October 8. The womens crick… [+4900 chars]

articles.title: Maharashtra Awards Dharavi Slum Redevelopment Project To Adani Group - BQ Prime
articles.description: In November, the Adani Group won the project to redevelop Dharavi, one of Asia's largest slums.
articles.content: The project, expected to cost around Rs 23,000 crore, will be one of the largest redevelopments by a government agency in India through global tendering. It will require the rehabilitation of existin… [+658 chars]
